url_title.description: The Pipeline title displayed in the URL

order_nr.description: Defines the order of Pipelines. First order (`order_nr=0`) is the default Pipeline.

active.description: Whether this Pipeline will be made inactive (hidden) or active

deal_probability.description: Whether Deal probability is disabled or enabled for this Pipeline

add_time.description: The Pipeline creation time. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS.

update_time.description: The Pipeline update time. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS.
